item.title: GLVK Auto Install Script for KMS Activation
item.description: SimeonOnSecurity - KMS-Auto-PS GLVK Auto Install Script for KMS Activation Recommened Reading: Microsoft - KMS Client Keys (GLVK) How to run the script: Manual Install: If manually downloaded, the script must be launched from an administrative powershell in the directory containing all the files from the GitHub Repository Set-ExecutionPolicy -ExecutionPolicy RemoteSigned -Force Get-ChildItem -Recurse *.ps1 | Unblock-File .\sos-kmsglvkactivationauto.ps1
